LanguageData.PlateNichromeAlloy.description: Placas de metal con remaches para un estilo industrial. Demasiado tiempo para hacerlas, pero fácil de mantener limpias. Beauty: 2.

LanguageData.SterileTile.label: sterile tile
LanguageData.SterileTile.description: Sterile tiles are clean, light grey squares. Very useful in hospitals to help prevent infections. Quite slow to build. Beauty: 0.
LanguageData.SilverTile.label: silver tile
LanguageData.SilverTile.description: Expensive and slow to build. Soft grey tiles with a grey bordering. Beauty: 3.
